title: FloatingRateIndexFixingTime
description: This type holds parameters defining the normal fixing time for a floating rate index.

hourMinuteTime.description: A time specified in hh:mm:ss format where the second component must be '00', e.g. 11am would be represented as 11:00:00.

businessCenter.description: A code identifying a business day calendar location. A business day calendar location is drawn from the list identified by the business day calendar location enumeration.

designatedMaturity.description: Allows a designed maturity to be specified for the fixing time.

fixingTimeDefinition.description: Legal text that underlies the Fixing Time. ISDA Fixing Time Definition. (e.g. 09:30, Sydney time).
